gen_ai.provider.name: openai
gen_ai.operation.name: chat
gen_ai.input.messages: [{"role":"user","parts":[{"type":"text","content":"Weather in Paris?"}]},{"role":"assistant","parts":[{"type":"text","content":"Absolutely! Let me check the weather for you."},{"type":"tool_call","id":"1234","name":"get_weather","arguments":{"location":"Paris"}}]},{"role":"tool","parts":[{"type":"tool_call_response","id":"1234","response":"rainy, 57°F"}]}]
gen_ai.output.messages: [{"role":"assistant","parts":[{"type":"text","content":"The weather in Paris is currently rainy with a temperature of 57°F."}],"finish_reason":"stop"}]
